blocks.subject: RE: Power Crisis in the West
text: After a discussion with Stacey we have decided to change the coding of the
wires referred to below.  Please code per the original wires to 24091000,
Dana is sending the original wires back to you.
Please call me with any questions.

blocks.subject: St. Mary's Bank Info
raw_header: cc: Pam Becton/HOU/ECT@ECT, Stacey A Aune/HOU/ECT@ECT, Dana Davis/HOU/ECT@ECT
text: Dana Davis is sending the original wires back to you to enter into the A/P
system for the month of January.  The wires have been sent out to Southwest
Bank of Texas so you will only be entering this information into the A/P
system but NO WIRES SHOULD BE SENT.
Please code (Debit) these 3 wires to 30016000, Profit Center 12854 (as marked
Should you have any questions or problems, please call me at 853-5961.

blocks.subject: St. Mary's Bank Info  Tammy:  Please provide Rosemary with the coding we discussed if not already in AP for  January.  Thank you! Pam
